Title: Bed Time
Plot: Since the dawn of time, men and women have been falling in love - and men have been trying to get straight home afterwards. Can fallen playboy Patrick Maitland ever find his way home from the Enchanted Glade of his one true love and get a decent night's kip? Kate Isitt as Sally makes her singing debut.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
GuestStars: Jack Brough, Saskia Mulder, Steve Brody, Michael Price
